question: Based on the restaurant revenue chart, which service type had the highest total revenue across all four days?

options.A: Lunch service had the highest total revenue
options.B: Dinner service had the highest total revenue
options.C: Takeout service had the highest total revenue
options.D: Cannot be determined due to scale issues

explanation: The chart uses an inappropriate scale range (1500-8000) that starts well above zero, making it difficult to accurately compare the relative revenue of different service types. While Lunch service does have the highest total revenue ($12,000), the truncated scale makes Dinner service appear to have a similar volume, potentially misleading viewers about the actual differences between service types.
